name: Remediation: A Dream Emulator *DEMO*
description:
*NOTE: game currently HAS to be played with vsync enabled*

Inspired by LSD: Dream Emulator, this game is an exploration through spaces, some inspired by real dreams, all with the ambition of creating a sense of yearning and loneliness. These feelings can only be remediated by embracing dreams from a simpler state of mind.

*NOTE: there is currently no way to beat the game demo*

CONTROLS:

WASD (move), SHIFT (power walk),  S (start), Q (quit)

CREDITS:

3D modeling, texturing, scripting, music, sound FX all by Viela (me)

PSX Shader by Triple Axis, First Person Camera by Aedan Graves, Rain Maker by Jeff Johnson
